https://tmrev.io/movie/968-Dog Day Afternoon 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mavrhr0ig2aCRR8d48yaxtD5aMQ.jpg Based on the true story of would-be Brooklyn bank robbers John Wojtowicz and Salvatore Naturale. Sonny and Sal attempt a bank heist which quickly turns sour and escalates into a hostage situation and stand-off with the police. As Sonny's motives for the robbery are slowly revealed and things become more complicated, the heist turns into a media circus. Dog Day Afternoon
